definition.text: Endpoints are important aspects of interacting with server-side web APIs, as they specify where resources lie that can be accessed by third party software. Usually the access is via a URI to which HTTP requests are posted, and from which the response is thus expected.

paragraphs.text: Read the docs of the API you are trying to map, and indentigy the commands that it support (endpoints).
Superalgos->Topic->Data Mining - Fetching Data From APIs->Main Workflow
